thread.title: Mine trial witness says he was threatened with prosecution
thread.title_full: Mine trial witness says he was threatened with prosecution

title: Mine trial witness says he was threatened with prosecution
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A key government witness in the trial of a coal boss accused of conspiring to break mine safety laws says he was threatened with prosecution...
